select /*+ INDEX_ASC(users user_id) */ users.user_id ,users.user_name ,users.user_email ,users.user_phone ,count(project_tasks.taskGroup_code) as taskCountTotal ,count(case when project_tasks.task_status_code = 'taskstatus100' then 1 end) as taskCountProcessing ,count(case when project_tasks.task_status_code = 'taskstatus200' then 1 end) as taskCountComplete ,count(case when project_tasks.task_status_code = 'taskstatus300' then 1 end) as taskCountStandBy from users
INNER join project_members on users.user_id = project_members.user_id
inner join project_task_groups on project_members.project_code = project_task_groups.project_code
inner join project_tasks on project_task_groups.taskGroup_code = project_tasks.taskGroup_code
group by users.user_id, users.user_name, users.user_email, users.user_phone
